products.title: White (7001)
products.description: Low maintenance, moisture resistant venetian blinds are perfect for bathrooms and kitchens. Their unique cordless design eliminates unsightly hanging cords and allows you to easily tilt the slats in any direction for optimum light adjustment. Perfect for high humidity rooms. Easy to clean. Optimum light adjustment. Preserves your view whole providing privacy. No hanging cords. Installs in minutes.
